missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> is a Rebel figure under Mak's control. When Mak activates, ready and activate the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. Mak's hero figure is not deployed and cannot activate. Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. The <color="red">AT-ST</color> can enter and occupy spaces on the Hangar. When the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is defeated, click the Imperial mission token and select "AT-ST defeated".
{-} Any attacks that target Mak while his figure is not deployed instead target the <color="red">AT-ST</color>.
{-} The wall between the Hangar (tile 19A) and Testing Grounds (tile 2B) does not block movement or line of sight.
{-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You're concerned with Mak's obsession with destroying this facility. He still hasn't told you what sort of importance it holds, but his attitude is quite volatile.

That is, until you arrive in the main hangar of the facility and he spots an unmanned scout walker.

{-} The wall between the Hangar (tile 19A) and Testing Grounds (tile 2B) does not block movement or line of sight.
{-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Place the <color="red">AT-ST</color> figure on the red highlighted spaces.
{-} The <color="red">AT-ST</color> is a Rebel figure under Mak's control. When Mak activates, ready and activate the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. Mak's hero figure is not deployed and cannot activate. Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. The <color="red">AT-ST</color> can enter and occupy spaces on the Hangar. When the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is defeated, click the Imperial mission token and select "AT-ST defeated".
{-} Any attacks that target Mak while his figure is not deployed instead target the <color="red">AT-ST</color>.
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

events.eventText:
Mak makes a thorough search of the facility, retrieving prototype components before planting several explosive charges.

From a safe distance away, you watch as the needlessly massive explosion reduces the facility to tiny smoldering fragments.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Mak receives the "Shadow Suit" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

"Not again!" Mak shouts, trying to push forward even as you drag him away and depart the planet.

With smoldering anger, Mak crouches in the corner of the hold, muttering "Next time ... " over and over under his breath.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Shouting curses, Mak dives out of the top of the walker as it continues to be assailed from all sides.

Mak hits the ground hard. He rises to his feet as his tactical advantage detonates, sending him sprawling once more.

{-} Place Mak's figure in one of the spaces that was occupied by the <color="red">AT-ST</color>. He suffers 10 {H}.

eventActions.mainText: Please select the correct option. 1: The Royal Guard Champion is on the map and has suffered 7 or more {H}. 2: The Royal Guard Champion is on the map and has suffered less than 7 {H}. 3: The Royal Guard Champion is not on the map.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The wall between the Hangar (tile 19A) and Testing Grounds (tile 2B) does not block movement or line of sight.
{-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: When the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is defeated, click "AT-ST defeated".

events.eventText: The onslaught of Imperial forces starts to subside. This is likely to be one of the final waves.
Shouting Imperial soldiers come running, carrying an enormous blaster cannon on a tripod.
The <color="red">Royal Guard Champion</color> recovers {H} equal to 1 + threat level (*1*).
The <color="red">Royal Guard Champion</color> moves 5 towards the closest Rebel, then attacks that Rebel, if possible.
The two Imperial figures with the highest figure cost become Focused.

mapEntities.mainText: When the <color="red">AT-ST</color> is defeated, click "AT-ST defeated".
